title: 'I prefer to die than to go with them': Afghan women dread Taliban rule
content:
1. 'I prefer to die than to go with them': Afghan women dread Taliban rule  Los Angeles Times
  2. Coming up: Boris Johnson leads Commons debate on the Taliban takeover of Afghanistan  The Telegraph
  3. Human remains discovered in wheel well of C-17 that departed Kabul with Afghans clinging to it  Fox News
  4. RNC Chairwoman McDaniel: Biden's Afghanistan catastrophe proves beyond a doubt he is a failed president  Fox News
  5. Fear of refugees must not shape the response to Afghanistan’s crisis  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
